patthana16.47:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo
patthana16.47:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.47:1.1_2: nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.47:1.1_3: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca
patthana16.47:1.1_4: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.47:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
